levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(二)

examples.english: He likes to run down the hill when he plays outside.
examples.chinese: 他喜歡在外面玩的時候跑下山。

examples.english: Please put your bag down on the chair.
examples.chinese: 請把你的包包放在椅子上。

examples.english: After a long day, she just wanted to sit down and rest.
examples.chinese: 忙碌了一天後，她只想坐下來休息。

examples.english: First, finish your homework, then you can watch TV.
examples.chinese: 你先完成功課，然後你就可以看電視。

examples.english: My grandpa was a young boy then, living in the countryside.
examples.chinese: 我爺爺那時還是個年輕男孩，住在鄉下。

examples.english: If it rains tomorrow, then we will play indoors instead.
examples.chinese: 如果明天會下雨，那麼我們就會改在室內玩。

examples.english: He was so tired, he couldn't even finish his homework.
examples.chinese: 他太累了，甚至無法完成他的功課。

examples.english: It was very dark; I couldn't even see my hand in front of my face.
examples.chinese: 天色很暗；我甚至看不清我眼前的手。

examples.english: Everyone likes the new teacher, even the naughty students.
examples.chinese: 每個人都喜歡新老師，甚至連那些調皮的學生也一樣。

examples.english: Your answer to the math problem is wrong.
examples.chinese: 你的數學問題答案是錯的。

examples.english: It is wrong to lie to your friends.
examples.chinese: 對朋友說謊是不對的。

examples.english: Something is wrong with my stomach today.
examples.chinese: 我的肚子今天有點不對勁。

examples.english: There are many students in my English class.
examples.chinese: 我的英文課裡有許多學生。

examples.english: I saw many beautiful flowers in the park yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在公園裡看到了許多美麗的花。

examples.english: Many students like to play basketball after school.
examples.chinese: 許多學生喜歡在放學後打籃球。

examples.english: I need something to drink because I am thirsty.
examples.chinese: 我口渴了，所以我需要喝點東西。

examples.english: My friend told me something interesting about the new movie.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友告訴我一些關於新電影的有趣事情。

examples.english: We should find something fun to do after school today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天放學後應該找點好玩的事情做。

examples.english: He ate everything on his plate very quickly.
examples.chinese: 他很快地吃光了他盤子裡的每樣東西。

examples.english: She told me everything about her new school.
examples.chinese: 她把她新學校的所有事情都告訴了我。

examples.english: My family means everything to me; they always support me.
examples.chinese: 我的家人對我來說就是一切；他們總是支持我。

examples.english: I don't have anything planned for this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我這個週末沒有任何計畫。

examples.english: Is there anything you want to ask about the homework?
examples.chinese: 關於作業，你有任何事情想問嗎？

examples.english: You can do anything fun during your summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 你可以在暑假期間做任何有趣的事情。

examples.english: Dodge ball is my favorite sport to play with friends.
examples.chinese: 躲避球是我最喜歡和朋友一起玩的運動。

examples.english: Playing dodge ball helps us stay active and have fun.
examples.chinese: 玩躲避球幫助我們保持活力並享受樂趣。

examples.english: She threw the dodge ball very hard during the game.
examples.chinese: 在比賽中，她把躲避球丟得非常用力。

examples.english: I like to play tennis with my friends.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡和我的朋友們打網球。

examples.english: Please pass me the yellow tennis ball.
examples.chinese: 請把那顆黃色的網球傳給我。

examples.english: My sister takes tennis lessons every Saturday.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐每個星期六上網球課。

examples.english: Badminton is a very popular sport in Taiwan. (羽球在台灣是很受歡迎的運動。)
My friends and I often play badminton on weekends. (我和朋友週末常常打羽球。)
We had a great game of badminton last night. (我們昨晚打了一場很棒的羽球。)
Doing sport regularly is good for your health and mind.
examples.chinese: 定期運動對你的健康和心靈有益處。

examples.english: Basketball is my favorite sport, and I play it often.
examples.chinese: 籃球是我最喜歡的運動，我經常打它。

examples.english: Many students enjoy playing different sports after school.
examples.chinese: 許多學生放學後喜歡玩不同的運動。

examples.english: He is a great baseball player and always tries his best.
examples.chinese: 他是一位很棒的棒球選手，總是全力以赴。

examples.english: The soccer player quickly kicked the ball into the goal.
examples.chinese: 那位足球員快速地將球踢進了球門。

examples.english: Every player on the team worked hard to win the game.
examples.chinese: 隊上的每位球員都努力工作以贏得比賽。

examples.english: My sister loves to skate with her friends. (verb)
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐喜歡和她的朋友們溜冰。

examples.english: He got a new pair of roller skates for his birthday. (noun)
examples.chinese: 他生日時收到一雙新的直排輪溜冰鞋。

examples.english: It's fun to skate on the frozen pond in winter. (verb, specific context)
examples.chinese: 在冬天於結冰的池塘上溜冰很有趣。

examples.english: We can learn many lessons from the past.
examples.chinese: 我們可以從過去學到很多教訓。

examples.english: Don't worry about past mistakes; just try your best now.
examples.chinese: 不要擔心過去的錯誤；現在只要盡力就好。

examples.english: The boy walked past the old tree every day.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩每天走過那棵老樹。

examples.english: She goes to the gym to stay healthy.
examples.chinese: 她去健身房保持健康。

examples.english: Our school built a new gym last year.
examples.chinese: 我們學校去年蓋了一座新的體育館。

examples.english: I need to go to the gym to play badminton.
examples.chinese: 我需要去體育館打羽毛球。

examples.english: A small rat quickly ran into the dark hole.
examples.chinese: 一隻小老鼠很快地跑進了那個黑暗的洞裡。

examples.english: Don't rat on your friend if he makes a small mistake.
examples.chinese: 如果你的朋友犯了個小錯誤，不要去告他的狀。

examples.english: The rat was hiding behind the box, looking for food.
examples.chinese: 那隻老鼠藏在箱子後面，正在找食物。

examples.english: It takes one hour to finish my homework.
examples.chinese: 完成我的功課需要一個小時。

examples.english: My mom will be back in an hour.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽一個小時後會回來。

examples.english: We work eight hours every day.
examples.chinese: 我們每天工作八個小時。

examples.english: My grandma told us a wonderful story last night.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶昨晚給我們講了一個很棒的故事。

examples.english: The story of this new movie is very exciting.
examples.chinese: 這部新電影的故事非常刺激。

examples.english: Can you share your funny story with the class?
examples.chinese: 你能跟班上同學分享你那個有趣的故事嗎？

examples.english: This pencil is about fifteen centimeters long.
examples.chinese: 這個鉛筆大約十五公分長。

examples.english: My plant grew three centimeters last week.
examples.chinese: 我的植物上週長高了三公分。

examples.english: Please cut the paper ten centimeters wide.
examples.chinese: 請把紙剪成十公分寬。

examples.english: Are you sure you finished your homework?
examples.chinese: 你確定你完成你的家庭作業了嗎？

examples.english: Can you open the window? Sure, I can do that for you.
examples.chinese: 你可以打開窗戶嗎？當然，我可以幫你做。

examples.english: Please make sure you bring your English book tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 請確保你明天帶你的英文課本。

examples.english: He is the only boy in his class who can speak French.
examples.chinese: 他是班上唯一會說法語的男生。

examples.english: We only have five minutes left to finish the test.
examples.chinese: 我們只剩下五分鐘可以完成考試了。

examples.english: You can only borrow this book if you have a library card.
examples.chinese: 你只有圖書館借書證才能借這本書。

examples.english: We had a wonderful day at the zoo with all our friends.
examples.chinese: 我們和所有朋友在動物園度過了美好的一天。

examples.english: Her new song sounds wonderful, I love the melody.
examples.chinese: 她的新歌聽起來很棒，我喜歡那個旋律。

examples.english: It is wonderful to finally finish my homework and relax now.
examples.chinese: 終於寫完功課並放鬆下來的感覺很棒。

examples.english: She sings very well and enjoys her music class.
examples.chinese: 她唱得非常好，也很喜歡她的音樂課。

examples.english: Please listen well to the teacher's important instructions.
examples.chinese: 請仔細聽老師重要的指示。

examples.english: I hope your new school life goes well for you.
examples.chinese: 我希望你的新學校生活一切順利。

examples.english: Hey, look! There's a rainbow in the sky after the rain.
examples.chinese: 嘿，你看！雨後天空有彩虹耶。

examples.english: Hey, Mom! I'm home from school now.
examples.chinese: 嘿，媽媽！我現在從學校回家了。

examples.english: Hey, that's my pencil! Please give it back to me.
examples.chinese: 喂，那是我的鉛筆！請還給我。

examples.english: My dog loves to catch the frisbee in the park.
examples.chinese: 我的狗喜歡在公園裡接飛盤。

examples.english: We need to run fast to catch the bus.
examples.chinese: 我們需要跑快一點才能趕上公車。

examples.english: I ran to catch up with my friends.
examples.chinese: 我跑去趕上我的朋友。

examples.english: Please count the books on the table.
examples.chinese: 請數一數桌上的書。

examples.english: Does this bonus point count towards my grade?
examples.chinese: 這個加分有算進我的成績嗎？

examples.english: Let's count down from ten to one.
examples.chinese: 我們從十倒數到一吧。

examples.english: The little girl likes to hold her teddy bear when she sleeps.
examples.chinese: 小女孩睡覺時喜歡抱著她的泰迪熊。

examples.english: Please hold my hand when we cross the busy street.
examples.chinese: 當我們過馬路時，請牽著我的手。

examples.english: Can you help me hold this heavy box for a minute?
examples.chinese: 你可以幫我拿著這個很重的箱子一分鐘嗎？

examples.english: Please help me carry these books to the library.
examples.chinese: 請幫我把這些書搬到圖書館。

examples.english: My mom often carries a reusable bag for shopping.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽購物時通常會攜帶一個環保袋。

examples.english: This old river carries water all the way to the sea.
examples.chinese: 這條古老的河流將水帶到大海。

examples.english: I loved visiting the science museum last weekend.
examples.chinese: 上週末我喜愛參觀科學博物館。

examples.english: She really loves the new storybook her brother gave her.
examples.chinese: 她非常喜愛她哥哥給她的新故事書。

examples.english: We will love playing games together at the party tonight.
examples.chinese: 今晚在派對上我們將會喜愛一起玩遊戲。

examples.english: Mom always kisses me on the cheek before I go to school.
examples.chinese: 媽媽在我上學前總是在我臉頰上親吻我。

examples.english: Please give your grandma a big kiss goodbye before we leave.
examples.chinese: 在我們離開前，請給奶奶一個大大的親吻道別。

examples.english: The actors kissed at the end of the play.
examples.chinese: 演員們在戲劇的結尾親吻了。

examples.english: What else do you want to eat?
examples.chinese: 你還想吃什麼？

examples.english: Is anyone else coming to the party?
examples.chinese: 還有其他人會來派對嗎？

examples.english: Hurry up, or else we will be late.
examples.chinese: 快一點，不然我們會遲到。

examples.english: You may leave the classroom after you finish your test.
examples.chinese: 你考完試後就可以離開教室了。

examples.english: It may rain heavily, so bring an umbrella with you.
examples.chinese: 可能會下大雨，所以請帶傘。

examples.english: If you study hard, you may pass the exam easily.
examples.chinese: 如果你努力學習，你可能會輕鬆通過考試。

examples.english: Please remember to finish your homework before class.
examples.chinese: 請記得在課前完成你的作業。

examples.english: Brush your teeth before you go to bed every night.
examples.chinese: 你每天晚上睡覺前請刷牙。

examples.english: I have never seen this movie before.
examples.chinese: 我以前從沒看過這部電影。

examples.english: She eats an apple after her lunch every day.
examples.chinese: 她每天午餐後吃一個蘋果。

examples.english: He washed his hands after he finished playing outside.
examples.chinese: 他玩完外面後洗了手。

examples.english: You should brush your teeth after you eat dinner.
examples.chinese: 你晚餐後應該刷牙。

examples.english: The class has about 30 students.
examples.chinese: 班上大約有30位學生。

examples.english: We talked about our plans for the summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 我們談論了關於暑假計畫的事。

examples.english: The show is about to start in five minutes.
examples.chinese: 表演即將在五分鐘後開始。

examples.english: Will you study English or math tonight?
examples.chinese: 你今晚要讀英文或者數學？

examples.english: Study hard, or you won't pass the test.
examples.chinese: 努力讀書，否則你考試不會及格。

examples.english: The book is on the desk, or under the chair.
examples.chinese: 這本書在桌上，或者在椅子下。

examples.english: Please take off your shoes inside the house.
examples.chinese: 請在屋內脫下你的鞋子。

examples.english: He went off to school early this morning.
examples.chinese: 他今天早上很早就去學校了。

examples.english: The car drove off quickly after stopping.
examples.chinese: 汽車停下後很快就開走了。

examples.english: I often eat noodles for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我晚餐常常吃麵條。

examples.english: My mom makes delicious beef noodles for me.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽會為我做美味的牛肉麵。

examples.english: Instant noodles are easy and quick to cook.
examples.chinese: 泡麵既簡單又快速烹煮。

examples.english: I really like to eat chocolate after dinner.
examples.chinese: 我晚餐後真的很喜歡吃巧克力。

examples.english: My favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的冰淇淋口味是巧克力。

examples.english: She gave me a small bar of chocolate yesterday.
examples.chinese: 她昨天給我一小塊巧克力。

examples.english: Please shake the bottle before you drink the juice.
examples.chinese: 請在喝果汁前先搖晃瓶子。

examples.english: He will shake when he feels very cold.
examples.chinese: 當他覺得很冷時，他會發抖。

examples.english: She shook her head to say no to the offer.
examples.chinese: 她搖了搖頭，拒絕了那個提議。

examples.english: I like to add a little sugar to my coffee every morning.
examples.chinese: 我每天早上喜歡在咖啡裡加一點糖。

examples.english: Most children love candy because it has a lot of sugar.
examples.chinese: 大多數孩子喜歡糖果，因為它有很多糖。

examples.english: Eating too much sugar is bad for your teeth and overall health.
examples.chinese: 吃太多糖對你的牙齒和整體健康不好。

examples.english: We usually eat three meals a day: breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
examples.chinese: 我們通常一天吃三餐：早餐、午餐和晚餐。

examples.english: My mom cooked a delicious meal for us last night.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨晚為我們煮了一頓美味的餐點。

examples.english: Eating a healthy meal helps you stay strong and energetic.
examples.chinese: 吃健康的餐點能幫助你保持強壯和有活力。

examples.english: Don't forget to bring your water bottle to school today.
examples.chinese: 今天不要忘記帶你的水瓶去學校。

examples.english: He drank a whole bottle of milk for breakfast.
examples.chinese: 他早餐喝了一整瓶牛奶。

examples.english: My little sister drinks her milk from a baby bottle.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹用奶瓶喝牛奶。

examples.english: Please put your cookies on the small plate.
examples.chinese: 請把你的餅乾放在這個小盤子上。

examples.english: Mom asked me to wash all the dirty plates after lunch.
examples.chinese: 媽媽叫我午餐後洗所有髒盤子。

examples.english: We need two more clean plates for the new guests.
examples.chinese: 我們需要再兩個乾淨的盤子給新客人。

examples.english: He had to pick up his fallen pencil from the floor.
examples.chinese: 他必須從地上撿起他掉落的鉛筆。

examples.english: Can you pick one favorite color for your new room?
examples.chinese: 你能為你的新房間挑選一個最喜歡的顏色嗎？

examples.english: They will pick fresh berries in the garden this afternoon.
examples.chinese: 他們今天下午將在花園裡採摘新鮮的漿果。

examples.english: What does this word mean in English?
examples.chinese: 這個字在英文裡是什麼意思？

examples.english: It's not nice to be mean to others.
examples.chinese: 對別人很刻薄是不好的。

examples.english: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
examples.chinese: 我不是故意要傷害你的感情。

examples.english: Our team won first place in the game.
examples.chinese: 我們的隊伍在比賽中獲得了第一名。

examples.english: Please finish your homework first, then you can play.
examples.chinese: 請先完成你的功課，然後你就可以玩了。

examples.english: When I first came to this school, I was nervous.
examples.chinese: 當我第一次來到這所學校時，我很緊張。

examples.english: She finished the race in second place.
examples.chinese: 她在比賽中得到第二名。

examples.english: It only takes a second to open the door.
examples.chinese: 開門只需要一秒鐘。

examples.english: We will have our second English test next week.
examples.chinese: 我們下週將進行第二次英文考試。

examples.english: He is the third student to present his report today.
examples.chinese: 他是今天第三個上台報告的學生。

examples.english: My dad's birthday is on the third of May.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸的生日是五月三日。

examples.english: This is my third time eating pineapple cake.
examples.chinese: 這是我第三次吃鳳梨酥。

examples.english: My father works hard to earn money for our family.
我的爸爸很努力工作，為我們家賺錢。
She wants to buy a new phone, but she doesn't have enough money.
她想買一支新手機，但她沒有足夠的錢。
Saving money is important so you can buy what you need later.
存錢很重要，這樣你之後才能買你需要的東西。
Mother's Day is always on the second Sunday in May.
examples.chinese: 母親節總是在五月的第二個星期天。

examples.english: We often give our moms flowers or cards on Mother's Day.
examples.chinese: 我們常在母親節送花或卡片給媽媽。

examples.english: Mother's Day is a special day to thank our mothers.
examples.chinese: 母親節是個感謝媽媽的特別日子。

examples.english: Do you have any good ideas for our class trip?
examples.chinese: 你對我們的班級旅行有什麼好主意嗎？

examples.english: I have no idea how to solve this math problem.
examples.chinese: 我不知道如何解決這道數學問題。

examples.english: It was a great idea to bring an umbrella today.
examples.chinese: 今天帶傘是個很棒的主意。

examples.english: She is happy because she passed the test.
examples.chinese: 她很高興因為她通過了考試。

examples.english: We stayed home yesterday because it rained heavily.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天待在家裡因為下大雨。

examples.english: I like this book because it has many interesting stories.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡這本書因為它有很多有趣的故事。

examples.english: She opened the top drawer to find her keys.
examples.chinese: 她打開上面的抽屜找她的鑰匙。

examples.english: My desk drawer is full of old papers and pencils.
examples.chinese: 我的書桌抽屜裡裝滿了舊紙和鉛筆。

examples.english: This cabinet has two big drawers for clothes.
examples.chinese: 這個櫃子有兩個大抽屜可以放衣服。

examples.english: I take a bath every evening before bed.
examples.chinese: 我每天晚上睡前洗澡。

examples.english: After a long day, a warm bath feels wonderful.
examples.chinese: 漫長的一天之後，泡個溫水澡感覺很棒。

examples.english: The baby needs a bath now because he cried.
examples.chinese: 小寶寶現在需要洗澡，因為他哭了。

examples.english: A cow gives us fresh milk to drink every day.
examples.chinese: 一頭母牛每天給我們新鮮牛奶喝。

examples.english: Many cows live on the big farm near our town.
examples.chinese: 許多母牛住在我們鎮附近的大農場裡。

examples.english: The brown cow likes to eat green grass in the field.
examples.chinese: 那頭棕色的母牛喜歡在田裡吃綠草。

examples.english: Let's go to the night market to eat dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚去夜市吃晚餐吧。

examples.english: There is a big market for new toys for kids.
examples.chinese: 兒童新玩具的市場很大。

examples.english: Our company will market these new shoes next spring.
examples.chinese: 我們公司明年春天將會銷售這些新鞋。

examples.english: This new smartphone is very expensive, but I like it.
examples.chinese: 這支新手機很昂貴，但我喜歡它。

examples.english: Eating at fancy restaurants can be very expensive.
examples.chinese: 在高級餐廳吃飯會非常昂貴。

examples.english: She decided not to buy the expensive shoes.
examples.chinese: 她決定不買那雙昂貴的鞋子。

examples.english: The store sells cheap clothes, so I can buy many.
examples.chinese: 這家店賣便宜的衣服，所以我可以買很多件。

examples.english: This cheap umbrella broke quickly in the rain.
examples.chinese: 這把便宜的雨傘在雨中很快就壞了。

examples.english: This restaurant has cheap and delicious food for students.
examples.chinese: 這家餐廳有便宜又好吃的食物給學生。

examples.english: Do we have enough water for our trip tomorrow?
examples.chinese: 我們明天旅行的水足夠嗎？

examples.english: My little brother is old enough to ride a bicycle by himself.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟夠大了，可以自己騎腳踏車了。

examples.english: I didn't study enough for the test, so I was a little worried.
examples.chinese: 我考試沒讀夠，所以我有點擔心。

examples.english: All the students in the class finished their homework on time.
examples.chinese: 班上所有的學生都準時完成作業。

examples.english: We cleaned all the rooms in the house yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天把房子裡所有的房間都打掃乾淨了。

examples.english: She spent all day reading a new book in her room.
examples.chinese: 她花了一整天的時間在房間裡讀一本新書。

examples.english: The poor dog shivered in the cold rain all night.
examples.chinese: 那隻可憐的狗整晚在冰冷的雨中發抖。

examples.english: Some poor countries do not have enough food for everyone.
examples.chinese: 一些貧窮的國家沒有足夠的食物給所有人。

examples.english: His vision is poor, so he needs to wear glasses to read.
examples.chinese: 他的視力不佳，所以他需要戴眼鏡閱讀。

examples.english: My mom always wakes up early to make breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽總是早起做早餐。

examples.english: We have an early class tomorrow at 7 AM.
examples.chinese: 我們明天早上七點有早課。

examples.english: You should arrive early for the meeting, so you won't be late.
examples.chinese: 你應該早點到會議，才不會遲到。

examples.english: My white shirt got dirty from playing outside.
examples.chinese: 我的白襯衫因為在外面玩而變髒了。

examples.english: Please don't touch the dirty floor with your clean shoes.
examples.chinese: 請不要用你乾淨的鞋子碰髒地板。

examples.english: The dirty dishes are piled up in the sink.
examples.chinese: 那些髒盤子都堆在水槽裡了。

examples.english: The math test was very easy for me.
examples.chinese: 這次數學考試對我來說非常容易。

examples.english: It is easy to learn new words in English.
examples.chinese: 學英文的新單字很容易。

examples.english: That online game has some really easy levels.
examples.chinese: 那個線上遊戲有一些非常簡單的關卡。

examples.english: Learning English can be hard, but it's fun.
examples.chinese: 學習英文可能很困難，但很有趣。

examples.english: The floor is very hard, so don't fall down.
examples.chinese: 地板很硬，所以不要跌倒了。

examples.english: You must work hard to achieve your goals.
examples.chinese: 你必須努力工作才能達成你的目標。

examples.english: My brother is busy doing his homework now.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥現在正忙著寫功課。

examples.english: The night market was very busy last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚夜市非常熱鬧/忙碌。

examples.english: I called her, but the phone line was busy.
examples.chinese: 我打電話給她，但是電話佔線中。

examples.english: This movie ticket is free for students.
examples.chinese: 這張電影票對學生來說是免費的。

examples.english: Are you free to help me tomorrow?
examples.chinese: 你明天有空幫我嗎？

examples.english: Is this seat free, or is it taken?
examples.chinese: 這個座位是空的，還是有人坐了？

examples.english: I need a pencil to write my name.
examples.chinese: 我需要一支鉛筆來寫我的名字。

examples.english: You need to listen carefully in class.
examples.chinese: 你需要上課時仔細聽。

examples.english: We don't need to worry about the rain today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天不需要擔心下雨。

examples.english: The class will end in ten minutes.
examples.chinese: 這堂課將在十分鐘後結束。

examples.english: We are looking forward to the end of the exam.
examples.chinese: 我們期待考試結束。

examples.english: The teacher asked us to end our discussion.
examples.chinese: 老師請我們結束討論。

examples.english: This new English book costs 300 NT dollars at the store.
examples.chinese: 這本新的英文書在書店花費三百元台幣。

examples.english: How much will it cost to buy a new phone?
examples.chinese: 買一支新手機會花費多少錢呢？

examples.english: To get good grades, it will cost you a lot of time.
examples.chinese: 為了得到好成績，這會花費你很多時間。

examples.english: My mom bought a new phone at the store yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽昨天在商店買了一支新手機。

examples.english: He wants to buy his sister a special birthday present.
examples.chinese: 他想買一份特別的生日禮物給他妹妹。

examples.english: We always buy fresh fruit from the market on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我們週末總是在市場購買新鮮水果。

examples.english: Please put the dictionary on my desk after you use it.
examples.chinese: 請在你用完後把字典放在我的書桌上。

examples.english: She usually puts on her uniform before school every day.
examples.chinese: 她通常每天在學校前穿上制服。

examples.english: Remember to put away your books after class is over.
examples.chinese: 記得下課後把你的書收好。

examples.english: Please remember to feed the fish every evening.
examples.chinese: 請記得每天晚上餵魚。

examples.english: Birds usually feed their young worms and insects.
examples.chinese: 鳥類通常用蟲子和昆蟲餵養牠們的幼鳥。

examples.english: Reading good books can feed your mind with new ideas.
examples.chinese: 閱讀好書可以用新的想法滋養你的心靈。
